features.details:
It;s a great feature of Insaf GPS Tracker.
If your will not run for some days, then you can active power saving mode.
Your device will be totally turn off, but it will active agian automatically when vehicle will be started

features.details:
The device has builtin strong battery backup
Which have ability to run device for 2 days.
features.name: Strong Battery Backup
